game.name: RoadOut
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Work for hire, thrash rival gangs and race for glory! You’re Claire, a mercenary who survives by executing sabotage, delivery and murder contracts in The Dead Zone. Raise hell in this post-apocalyptic action RPG that mixes rotatable dungeon exploration and top-down racing mechanics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Work for hire, thrash rival gangs and race for glory! You’re Claire, a mercenary who survives by executing sabotage, delivery and murder contracts in The Dead Zone. Raise hell in this post-apocalyptic action RPG that mixes rotatable dungeon exploration and top-down racing mechanics.
